author: Callaghan O'Hare
title: From home to hospital: Giving birth during the U.S. coronavirus outbreak
description: As a first-time mother with no idea what to expect, Nancy Pedroza was convinced the hospital was the safest place to have her baby.
content:
FORT WORTH, Texas (Reuters) - As a first-time mother with no idea what to expect, Nancy Pedroza was convinced the hospital was the safest place to have her baby. 
Nancy Pedroza, 27, who is pregnant, holds hands with Nichollette Jones, her doula, and Ryan Mor… [+4322 chars]
